net.electroland.lighting.detector.animation
Interface Animation

All Known Implementing Classes:
LinearFade, StripeAnimation, Throb
public interface Animation

Method Summary
 Raster getFrame()
          Returns the Raster to be returned for the latest frame of Animation to the AnimationManager.
 void init(java.util.Properties props)
          Called by the AnimationManager to pass in initialization properties when the animation is called.
 boolean isDone()
          Return 'true' to notify the AnimationManager that your animation has completed it's lifecycle.
 

Method Detail

init

void init(java.util.Properties props)
Called by the AnimationManager to pass in initialization properties when the animation is called. This will generally contain the contains of animation.properties.

Return 'true' to notify the AnimationManager that your animation has completed it's lifecycle.
